2052.subject: HPWE
2052.descrlong: Instructs on adapting Physical Activity for each individual's unique needs through the use of the pool to enhance one's overall health and wellbeing. Course content decided upon between instructor and student. Designed especially for individuals with permanent or temporary disability. Credit/no credit option. (Offered every semester.)

2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Instructs on adapting physical activity for individual needs through the use of the pool to enhance one's overall health and wellbeing. Instructor and student decide on content. In conjunction with adapted dry land, provides daily activity for individuals who are temporarily or permanently in need of adapted physical activity. Credit/no credit option. (Offered every semester.)
